article:
My name is Wang Li. My English teacher _ Linda. She is from the USA. _ has a son and a daughter. Her son is Ben. Her daughter is Maria. Her husband  is Paul Black . Mr Black is an English teacher , too. He and his son are _ New York now. Mrs Black and Maria are in China.
 Maria and I are classmates, and we are good friends . I teach  her Chinese and _ teaches me English.
